name: Zombie Toys [ Unity Certified Associate: Game Development Courseware ]
name_original: Zombie Toys [ Unity Certified Associate: Game Development Courseware ]
description:
Zombie Toys is a learning project created by following the Unity Certified Associate: Game Development Courseware.

You get to play as either a boy or girl who was shrunken down and has to fend of waves of Zombified toys. With the help of their sheep ally the can cast four different attacks, a lighting shot, a blizzard push, a stink bomb and a slime shot. How long into the night will you survive? 

Coureware Link - https://unityedustore.pearsonvue.com/unity-certified-associate-game-development-...

Controls:

Controls:Actions:Left Mouse Button
Shoot
WASD/Arrow Keys
Movement1 Key
Summon Ally
TabSwitch Attack
